page.title: 03Shops in the Aston Area
page.content: We have tried to discover what shopkeepers and customers think of the shopping facilities around Aston and Swallownest. Over the past years there have been a number of new housing estates built but no more shops have been provided. In this area all the shops are small businesses sometimes owned by families but there is a proposal for a new larger supermarket. We have no large department stores. Most shops in this area open from 9am to 5pm and we have a range of shops selling everything from pets to clothes. Most people think that the shops are fairly priced but limited. They would like to see greater variety for example: furniture, linens and domestic appliances. People use the shops around Swallownest but now they are going to larger shops outside the area, in the surrounding towns.
